Heading: Family event
Value: Divorced in 1969 and remarried in 1971; brother Jeff was arrested for dealing drugs

Heading: Problems in school?
Value: Severe learning disabilities, temper tantrums, dyslexia, zero social skills

Heading: Physically attractive?
Value: No, greasy hair, pimples, short, dirty teeth with a retainer

Heading: Physically abused?
Value: Yes, he hinted to close family friend that dad beats him, also his brother got mad at him and threw him out a window

Heading: Psychologically abused?
Value: Yes, he was teased, kids used him only for alcohol and rides, his dad refused that anything was his Jon’s fault and that his friends and the police made him do bad things

Heading: Age of first sexual experience
Value: ~25 years old grabbed the undercover cop, Lisa’s, boob and proceeded to masturbate

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Unspecified, most likely poor grades because of learning disabilities

Heading: IQ
Value: When in high school he tested with an  of 130 in areas not requiring reading and math; in 1987 Dr Wilkinson described his intelligence low-normal, no higher than 90

Heading: Source of IQ information
Value: Brinck (1999, page 53), CA Supreme Court transcript

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Fired from jobs?
Value: Yes; Belmont Lapidary, Pinkerton Security, The Bubble Machine, and Carl’s

Heading: Types of jobs worked
Value: Toys ‘R’ Us; Belmont Lapidary (jewelry store); Pinkerton Security; The Bubble Machine; IRS warehouse; Carl’s Jr

Heading: Sexual preference
Value: Evidence that he is a homosexual pedophile; no experience with women

Heading: Living with
Value: Mother and Father and then moved to Sacramento with sister

Heading: Been to a psychologist?
Value: Yes, the 'police shrink', Psychiatrist Hugh Ridelhuber

Heading: Time in forensic hospital?
Value: Only during the trail for observation and testing

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Nov. 1981 DUI; Aug 1982 hit and run; July and Aug 1983 two DUIs; license revoked for 3 years and 120 days in prison; 1986 Burglary of Richard Renne

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Date of first kill in series
Date of final kill in series
Method of killing
Value: Stabbing with buck knife and used a pipe cleaner and a board with nails on it for the third victim

Heading: Location of first contact
Value: First victim: at his home; second and third victim: found them at the park

Heading: Location of killing
Value: Edgewood Park for first victim; park near Waterdog Lake for second victim; Lower Sunrise park for the third victim

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Victim abducted or killed at contact?
Value: 1st victim voluntarily went with killer; second and third were killed at contact

Heading: Tortured victims?
Value: Held first victim down and told him what he was going to do and third victim a board was placed over his eyes and his clothes were taken off for humiliation

Heading: Date convicted
Value: Dec 6 1989 convicted of 2 counts of first degree murder; Dec 31 1994 plead guilty to third victims murder

Heading: Did serial killer confess?
Value: Confessed to all murders after conviction
